data.title: PeTar: ParticlE Tree & particle-particle & Algorithmic Regularization code for simulating massive star clusters
data.name: PeTar
data.description: PeTar is a high-performance N-body code for modelling the evolution of star clusters and tidal streams, including the effect of galactic potential, dynamics of binary and hierarchical system, single and binary stellar evolution.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "- **Incorporation of single and binary stellar evolution**: Within the N-body simulation, PeTar dynamically evolves the masses, radii, and stellar types of individual stars. It also tracks significant"
"PeTar is an N-body code specifically designed for modeling collisional stellar systems"
"petar serves as the primary routine for conducting N-body simulations" and usage examples like `petar [options] [snapshot filename]`
